text.title: Login
text.description: Please enter your credentials to login.

error.accountLocked: Your account is locked. Please contact support.

text.title: Registration Successful
text.activate: To activate your trial, please login and add credit card information.

text.title: Register Employee
text.subDescription: You invited an employee to join
text.subDescription2: Please fill in the details below to create their account.
text.alreadyHaveAccount: Does the employee already have an account?

required.name: Employee name is required
required.passwordConfirmationMismatch: Employee password confirmation does not match

text.title: Forgot Password
text.description: Enter your email to reset your password.

text.title: Password Reset Link Sent
text.description: A password reset link has been sent to your email.
text.success: Now you can reset your password.
text.checkEmail: Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.

text.title: Reset Password
text.description: Enter your email to reset your password.
text.subDescription: Please enter your new password below.

text.title: Password Reset Successful
text.description: Your password has been successfully reset.
text.success: You can now login with your new password.
text.checkEmail: Please check your email for confirmation.

text.excited: We're excited to have you on board. Let's get you set up and ready to go!
text.title: Create a Company
text.description: Enter your company details to create a new company.
text.descriptionAddress: Enter your company address to create a new company.
text.descriptionContact: Enter your company contact details to create a new company.

placeholder.name: Bijv. Mijn Dakbedrijf B.V.
placeholder.description: Enter a short description of your company

invalid.email: Please enter a valid email address
invalid.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
invalid.website: Please enter a valid website URL

emailNotVerified.title: Email not Verified
emailNotVerified.description: You're almost there! We've sent a verification code to your email. Please check your inbox and verify your account to get trial access to all features.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.description: Get your trial access to all features by adding a payment method.

otp.title: Verify Your Email
otp.description: Please enter the OTP sent to your email address to verify your account. If you did not receive the OTP, please check your spam folder or request a new one.

payment.title: Payment Method
payment.description: Add a payment method to get your trial access to all features.

description.color: Select a color for the team member

placeholder.name: Enter team member's name
placeholder.description: Enter a short description of the team member
placeholder.color: Select a color for the team member
placeholder.type: Select a type for the team member

maxLength.name: Name must be at most 255 characters long
maxLength.description: Description must be at most 255 characters long

required.name: Team member name is required
required.phone: Team member phone number is required
required.workingDays: Team member working days are required
required.startTime: Team member start time is required
required.endTime: Team member end time is required

maxLength.name: Name must be at most 255 characters long
maxLength.email: Email must be at most 255 characters long
maxLength.phone: Phone number must be at most 20 characters long

error.startTimeLessThanEndTime: Start time must be before end time
error.endTimeGreaterThanStartTime: End time must be after start time

placeholder.name: Enter company name
placeholder.description: Enter a short description of the company

text.title: Inloggen
text.description: Voer uw gegevens in om in te loggen.

error.accountLocked: Uw account is geblokkeerd. Neem contact op met de support.

text.title: Registratie succesvol
text.activate: Om uw proefperiode te activeren, log in en voeg uw creditcardgegevens toe.

text.title: Medewerker registreren
text.subDescription: U heeft een medewerker uitgenodigd om deel te nemen
text.subDescription2: Vul hieronder de gegevens in om het account aan te maken.
text.alreadyHaveAccount: Heeft de medewerker al een account?

placeholder.email: Vul het e-mailadres van de medewerker in
placeholder.name: Vul de naam van de medewerker in
placeholder.phone: Vul het telefoonnummer van de medewerker in
placeholder.password: Vul het wachtwoord van de medewerker in
placeholder.passwordConfirmation: Bevestig het wachtwoord van de medewerker

error.weakPassword: Wachtwoord van medewerker is te zwak.
error.passwordMismatch: Wachtwoorden van medewerker komen niet overeen.

required.name: Naam van medewerker is verplicht
required.passwordConfirmationMismatch: Wachtwoordbevestiging van medewerker komt niet overeen

text.title: Wachtwoord vergeten
text.description: Vul uw e-mailadres in om uw wachtwoord te resetten.

text.title: Wachtwoord reset link verzonden
text.description: Er is een link naar uw e-mail gestuurd om uw wachtwoord te resetten.
text.success: U kunt nu uw wachtwoord resetten.
text.checkEmail: Controleer uw e-mail en volg de instructies om uw wachtwoord te resetten.

text.title: Wachtwoord resetten
text.description: Vul uw e-mailadres in om uw wachtwoord te resetten.
text.subDescription: Voer hieronder uw nieuwe wachtwoord in.

required.passwordConfirmation: Bevestiging van nieuw wachtwoord is verplicht

text.title: Wachtwoord succesvol gereset
text.success: U kunt nu inloggen met uw nieuwe wachtwoord.

text.excited: We zijn blij dat je erbij bent. Laten we aan de slag gaan!
